divs: Sighting DetailsIt was late summer i beleave me and a freind of mine paul platt were standing on an observation point at carlyle lake at about 9-30 10 o-clock at nite looking at the sky and when i noticed from the west in the direction of st louis mo about 35 40 miles away a briter than normal lite was coming far of in the distance .seemed a lil to bright for a normal plane, well we keep looking at it for a while about 5- 10 min . we notice this thing is moveing not like a regular aircraft, it it zig zaging unlike an air craft is known to be able to do but it is moveing slow and i mean slow ecept when it would zig zag , well it stops the zig zag stuff and then just keeps coming staight another 5 min goes by and it is close to us real close about 150-175 yrds away from us at about a 45 degree angel it is huge and it makes no sound but a low hum its moveing so slow how is it staying up there the sky slightly has it lit up from the town lights it is a triangle three bright white lights on the bottom and a few in the rear which are smaller about five of them it passes by and slowly moves away we dont know what to think we tell a few people mostly our freinds and some make fun of us some just humor us but we know what we saw and thats why i havent told but a few more pople since all those years ago most just look at you and say yeah right . but it was something
Summary: the black triangle with 3 bright lites on bottom and some in the rear
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carlyle
This sighting has never been favorited.
